casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Marvin TRENT. No. 520A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State of NC. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Trent.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of November 2004 by Defendant to Strike Argument from State's New Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
